Class Histogram

java.lang.Object

                      marytts.signalproc.display.Histogram
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, CursorListener, CursorSource
Direct Known Subclasses:
EnergyHistogram, FFRTargetCostFunction.TargetCostReporter, HalfPhoneFFRTargetCostFunction.TargetCostReporter, JoinCostFeatures.JoinCostReporter, SilenceMarker
public class Histogram
extends FunctionGraph

Author:
Marc Schröder Display a 2d graph showing y(x), with labelled scales. This constructor is for subclasses only, which may need to perform some operations before calling initialise().
See Also:
Serialized Form
